name: codingame
description: Improve your CodinGame bot programming efficiency

codinGame.rootPath.description: Specifies the root directory of CodinGame projects

codinGame.includePath.description: Specifies the folder path containing common headers you use for bots and tools. If not defined, it will be codinGame.rootPath/tools/include

codinGame.libPath.description: Specifies the folder path containing libraries for tools. If not defined, it will be codinGame.rootPath/tools/lib

codinGame.scriptsPath.description: Specifies the folder path containing scripts for bots and tools. If not defined, it will be codinGame.rootPath/tools/scripts

codinGame.starterPath.description: Specifies the folder path containing an initial configuration for a bot. If not defined, it will be codinGame.rootPath/tools/starter

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
